function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Participants attending remotely due to self-quarantining and mandated staffing changes","Impact":"Potential lack of in-person interaction increasing the risk of contagious disease spread","Mitigation":"Implementing strict hygiene protocols and reducing physical presence when possible","Technologies":"Teleconference platforms with interactive features and live chat functions","People":"Faculty, residents, and staff attending remotely","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, conference organizers"},{"Description":"Some faculty struggling with novel technology and poor bandwidth connections for participants","Impact":"Difficulty in sharing and reviewing important information, potential delays in communication","Mitigation":"Investing time to train staff, providing technical support for participants, and conducting conferences at a multi-institutional level","Technologies":"Teleconference platforms, video recording and sharing tools","People":"Faculty, staff providers, and participants with poor bandwidth connections","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, conference organizers"}]}
